messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
CentCom Russian Outreach Program

Cargo: A group of angry Russians want to have a party. Can you send them your cargo shuttle then make them disappear?

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Cargo shuttle commandeered by CentCom.

The cargo shuttle should return in five minutes. Have some supply points for your trouble.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Gravitational anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Law Office.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Migration Alert

Due to space being cold, a whoop of [REDACTED] have migrated into the maintenance areas.

messages.author: Bridge
messages.body: If anyone is still alive out there, we are stationed on the bridge and we are surrounded.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: we have detected multiple zombie lifeforms upon your station due to this we have initated delta alert

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Electrical Storm Alert

An electrical storm has been detected in your area, please repair potential electronic overloads.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Biohazard Alert

Confirmed outbreak of level 7 viral biohazard aboard April Space-hulk 29. All personnel must contain the outbreak.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Lifesign Alert

Unknown biological entities have been detected near April Space-hulk 29, please stand-by.
